ai-anya-e1202n7:1_0: Then the kingdom, after making meritorious merit for the sake of his merit and forty-nine years.
ai-anya-e1202n7:1_1: After the passing of that younger brother, King Uttiya, reigned ten years.
ai-anya-e1202n7:1_2: After that very day the younger sent him back. When he had completed the ten years, King Mahāsudassana took her son, two years and gave her to them his son. He gave him two children each other. He then gave her own cloak to the royal son, gave two children.
ai-anya-e1202n7:1_3: Taking the uplands and performing the rites for ten years. He then took the royal coronation and capital given the queen. Then the king reigned ten years.
